body_html:
ok, I have tested it. It can do that, but sometimes with an error:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "cifar10_train.py", line 134, in <module>
    tf.app.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py", line 30, in run
    sys.exit(main(sys.argv[:1] + flags_passthrough))
  File "cifar10_train.py", line 130, in main
    train()
  File "cifar10_train.py", line 122, in train
    saver.save(sess, checkpoint_path, global_step=step)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py", line 1281, in save
    self.last_checkpoints, latest_filename)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py", line 743, in update_checkpoint_state
    file_io.rename(temp_pathname, coord_checkpoint_filename, overwrite=True)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.py", line 295, in rename
    compat.as_bytes(oldname), compat.as_bytes(newname), overwrite, status)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/contextlib.py", line 24, in __exit__
    self.gen.next()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/errors.py", line 463, in raise_exception_on_not_ok_status
    pywrap_tensorflow.TF_GetCode(status))
tensorflow.python.framework.errors.UnknownError

you just to modify cifar10 like this:

tf.app.flags.DEFINE_string('train_dir', 'hdfs://localhost:9000/cifar10_train',
                           """Directory where to write event logs """
                           """and checkpoint."""

body:
ok, I have tested it. It can do that, but sometimes with an error:

``` shell
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "cifar10_train.py", line 134, in <module>
    tf.app.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py", line 30, in run
    sys.exit(main(sys.argv[:1] + flags_passthrough))
  File "cifar10_train.py", line 130, in main
    train()
  File "cifar10_train.py", line 122, in train
    saver.save(sess, checkpoint_path, global_step=step)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py", line 1281, in save
    self.last_checkpoints, latest_filename)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py", line 743, in update_checkpoint_state
    file_io.rename(temp_pathname, coord_checkpoint_filename, overwrite=True)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.py", line 295, in rename
    compat.as_bytes(oldname), compat.as_bytes(newname), overwrite, status)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/contextlib.py", line 24, in __exit__
    self.gen.next()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/errors.py", line 463, in raise_exception_on_not_ok_status
    pywrap_tensorflow.TF_GetCode(status))
tensorflow.python.framework.errors.UnknownError
```

you just to modify cifar10 like this:

``` python
tf.app.flags.DEFINE_string('train_dir', 'hdfs://localhost:9000/cifar10_train',
                           """Directory where to write event logs """
                           """and checkpoint."""
```
